basic.description: This course enables students to work as an integral part of the OB/GYN residency team. Students take one call per rotation week and round on at least 1-2 labor patients and any routine patients that they deliver. Students write notes every two hours while on labor and delivery rounds, and give a fifteen to thirty minute case presentation on the last day of rotation.
basic.subject: MDI
basic.title: Labor and Delivery Sub-Internship
